about_the_game:
Only you can solve the mystery of Base 24. Comb a government base for evidence, catch suspects in their lies, and unravel the truth, no matter how ridiculous it may be!

Enter the comedic and mysterious world of Boomtown USA, a small desert town with big secrets, and help washed-up police sheriff Miranda Warren solve cases linked to the crime that destroyed her reputation. Investigate every nook and cranny of the crime scene. Even if something's not relevant to the case, your assistant will probably have something to say about it! Use Persuasion to exploit different facets of a witness' psychology to get them to open up to you! Ask questions, push suspects, and present evidence to uncover the truth during Interrogations.

Case 1: Occult Crime Police

Seven years ago, a missing persons case destroyed the reputation of Sheriff Miranda Warren. Now, a murder case at the same mysterious government base offers her a chance at redemption. But to reach it, she’ll have to deal with a condescending FBI Agent, a suspect who keeps lying to prove his own guilt, and whatever the hell a “Thought Influencer” is.

Case 2: Medium at Large

Boomtown, USA is visited by a spirit medium who claims to be able to solve the case which ruined Sheriff Miranda Warren's life seven years ago. Everyone in town has a reason to be upset about the upcoming seance, but could someone be upset enough... to kill?



  • Two novella-length murder mysteries to unravel!
  • Meet a colorful cast of characters and expose their deepest, darkest secrets!
  • Unravel cases which Agatha Christie might refer to as "a little much".
  • Lovingly illustrated backgrounds and charmingly animated characters.
  • Bask in the dulcet tones of a fully original soundtrack!
  • A full GUI Glow-Up, back-ported to the original game as well!
  • In a hurry? Use the new text skipping feature to fly by previously read text!

Content Warning

Occult Crime Police is a murder mystery so naturally there's gonna be some slightly heavy themes in here. These themes are generally presented in a light-hearted manner. Content includes depiction of a dead body, discussion of murder, familicide, kidnapping, and implied consumption of alcohol.

Additionally, the game contains flashing lights, which can be turned off in the options menu.
